results.overview: When Dr. Indiana Jones – the tweed-suited professor who just happens to be a celebrated archaeologist – is hired by the government to locate the legendary Ark of the Covenant, he finds himself up against the entire Nazi regime.
results.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

results.original_title: Raiders of the Lost Ark: The Adaptation
results.overview: After seeing Raiders of the Lost Ark in 1981, three 12 year old friends, Chris Strompolos, Eric Zala and Jayson Lamb, began filming their own shot-by-shot adaptation of the Spielberg classic in the backyards of their Mississippi homes. After 6 years, the film was ready.
results.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark: The Adaptation

results.original_title: The Making of 'Raiders of the Lost Ark'
results.overview: One of the first 'Making of...' movies to become a hit in its own right.
results.title: The Making of 'Raiders of the Lost Ark'

results.original_title: Great Movie Stunts: Raiders of the Lost Ark
results.overview: A documentary hosted by Harrison Ford about the stunts of 'Raiders of the Lost Ark.'
results.title: Great Movie Stunts: Raiders of the Lost Ark

results.original_title: On Set With Raiders Of The Lost Ark
results.overview: Behind the scenes footage, clips, outtakes and deleted scenes from Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981).
